revision.text: ==Sword and Shield== '''Note:''' After fulfilling the prerequisites, this quest can be accepted in the Bulletin Board in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Postwick]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Sword and Shield ! Type !! Requirement !!
